title: Inferno
short_cast: Tom Hanks, Felicity Jones, Omar Sy, Irrfan Khan, Sidse Babett Knudsen, Ben Foster, Ana Ularu, Ida Darvish, Paolo Antonio Simioni, Alessandro Grimaldi

desc: On the run and suffering from memory loss, a Harvard symbologist must decipher clues to stop a plague designed to decimate the planet's population.
